content: the poncho is this year s hot fashion item and this one is a quick-crochet project made with a large hook lion brand pattern # 30237 *30237-2ad pdf modified january 2005* skill level intermediate lion® boucle article #930 *discontinued* 399 yards chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* 200 yards crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm construction begins with base chain and foundation row special stitch str spike treble poncho is worked from the neck down in joined rounds back and forth for the most part in double_crochet yoke is shaped with increase corners at front back and shoulders back neck is raised with a separately worked short row *pattern is available as pdf download only *
